__data__.text: This is Crowd Agent at 2025年02月13日（星期四）09:30 Plan：Wake up at 6；Arrive at CHIJMES plazas by 7:00；Move and wait orderly according to guidance by 7:30；Observe crowd density and adjust stopping position by 8:00；Continue moving and waiting in plazas until 12:00；Take a break and rest in a suitable spot by 12:30；Resume orderly movement and waiting by 13:00；Adjust position based on congestion until 18:00；Stay in a suitable spot and observe the event by 19:00；Follow on-site guidance for departure by 20:00
